name: TV PALS
description:
Action Game for many many players. Just connect controllers and GO. Supports up to 10 players at once! Bring food to TV for power, knock out opponents to win.

TV PALS is multiplayer only and requires gamepads or smartphones.

To use phones as controllers:

  1. make sure your computer is connected to a wifi network.
  2. connect your phone to the same network
  3. navigate to happyfuntimes.net
  4. have fun :)

Upgrades to version 0.1.2:

  • level selection (yay!)
  • new game modes: free-for-all, team battle, and rocketry team
  • exciting new graphics
  • 2 all new levels and many tweaks to old levels

Version 0.1.3:

  • New version of happyfuntimes - no need to install any extra software :)
  • New levels
  • improved game feel :)
  • improved UI

Stick - MOVE

Button A - KICK, THROW, FEED

Button B - CARTWHEEL, INTERCEPT

TV PALS was made by Nick Crockett and peter lu.
